inclusion.criterion: International prostate symptom score is equal to or greater than 20
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Maximum flow rate is equal to or less than 10ml/s, or bladder outlet obstruction is diagnosed by urodynamics
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Any of the following complication: ① calculus in bladder; ② Recurrent urinary tract infections; ③Inguinal hernia; ④vesicoureteral reflux
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The physical status score of the Eastern Cancer Cooperative Group (ECOG) is 0 or 1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: There has been no previous evidence of malignancy in the past five years
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Non-hodgkins Marginal Zone Lymphoma of the left orbit Dx in 03

inclusion.criterion: The patient is in good physical condition and able to tolerate anesthesia and surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: There are no allergic reactions and liver or kidney function damage to endocrine drugs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to take and retain medicines
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to follow study visit schedules and other program requirements
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Be able to understand the character and purpose of the study, including possible risks and side effects
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The physical status score of East Cancer cooperative Group is equal to or greater than 2
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: There has been previous evidence of other malignancy in the past five years
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Non-hodgkins Marginal Zone Lymphoma of the left orbit Dx in 03

exclusion.criterion: Patients with high coagulation and cannot stop taking anticoagulants
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Abnormal coagulation function such as hemophilia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The patients are in poor physical condition and cannot tolerate anesthesia and surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The patients have allergy or toxic side effects and other adverse reaction to endocrine drug
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with active tuberculosis or other fulminating infectious disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. They have a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter and are currently on ditropan for urinary retention.
